import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Table,Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import './DashboardProducts.css' function DashboardProducts() { const products=useSelector(state=>state.products); const user=useSelector(state=>state.user); //removing the product function handleDeleteProduct(id){ } return ( {products.map(product=>)}

{product._id} {product._name} {product._price} Edit
) } export default DashboardProducts
